Export.Routine: LVBPITCOMESP04 ; MIC 2/11/2003 ; CREATE PIT FORMAT FILE - ECHEVARNE ; supported calls: ; ; create^LVBPITCOMESP04 ; --------------------------------- q create n Q ;SE ANULA s $zt="err" i $zcvt($zu(110),"U")'?1"TRAK".1N q l +^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT") k ^TMP($zn,$j) i $$select^MVBCFSM(1) q s sblock=$o(^TEDI("SENT-DATA","PIT",""),-1)+1 s (pack,env,idx)="" ;;;s st=$p($h,",",2) ; Oct 21, 2005 by Mc_Fly - Removed f s pack=$o(^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack)) q:pack="" d ;;;i ($p($h,",",2)-st)>20 q ; Oct 21, 2005 by Mc_Fly - Removed . f s env=$o(^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env)) q:env="" d .. k numpet,numpetmumps s ok=0 k REG .. f s idx=$o(^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env,idx)) q:idx="" d ... i idx=1 d .... s numpet=$P(^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env,idx),"#",1) .... i $$select^LVBEPVIS(numpet) .... I '($D(^ESP04ACT)) s numpetmumps=$P(PLIST(101),",",1) .... I '($D(^ESP04ACT)) i numpetmumps="" s numpetmumps=$$numpet(numpet) ... I '($D(^ESP04ACT)) I numpetmumps'="",numpetmumps'="REPETIR" d .... S ok=1 s REG(idx)=^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env,idx) ... I $D(^ESP04ACT) S ok=1 s REG(idx)=^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env,idx) .. I '($D(^ESP04ACT)) i ok=1 s ok="" s ok=$$enviar(numpetmumps,numpet,.REG) .. i ok=1 m ^TEDI("SENT-DATA","PIT",sblock,env)=^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env) .. i ok=1 k ^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env) .. i ok=0 m ^TMP($zn,$j,pack,env)=^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env) .. i ok=0!(ok=2) k ^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT",pack,env) l -^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT") d Close^SockServer m ^TEDI("OUT-DATA","PIT")=^TMP($zn,$j) k ^TMP($zn,$j) q numpet(numpet) ;peticiÃ³n de numero mumps k numpetmumpsa f x=1:1:3 s numpetmumpsa=$$petnum^SockServer(numpet) q:numpetmumpsa'="" q numpetmumpsa enviar(numpetmumps,numpet,REG) ;ENVIAR A LA RUTINA DE envpet^SockServer(numpetmumps,numpet,REG) q $$envpet^SockServer(numpetmumps,numpet,.REG,1) err d BACK^%ETN q
